oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Variation in clinical mastitis detection frequency and etiology among milkers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Duque-Madrid, P. C.
Blanc, C.
Largo, A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mastitis
etiology
diagnosis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Our objectives were to describe variation in 1) clinical mastitis detection frequency among milkers; 2) cases with bacterial growth among milkers; and, 3] etiology of clinical mastitis among milkers with low and high levels of detection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2015; 237
